page.title: 11The Brook in Bugbrooke
page.content:
{The Brook}
Flowing ever onwards, Never stopping, Flowing on its way, Clear and lovely, Calm and peaceful. The brook. Marnie England(11) On Thursday 13th June we went down to the brook.We left school at about 10.00 a.m.and returned at 12.00.The water flowing in the brook is very clean. There are two large tunnels which cross the brook.Over one tunnel flows the canal, and over the other runs the railway.In some places the brook is deep(1m.),but in others it is shallow(1.5cm).I love going down the brook because it is very beautiful and peaceful and you can see a lot of wildlife,trees,and plants.
